source:
.decl scc1(x: symbol, y: symbol)
.decl path(x: symbol, y: symbol)
.decl vertex(x: symbol)

scc(x) :- query(src), scc1(src, x).
scc1(x, x) :- vertex(x).
scc1(x, y) :- path(x, y), path(y, x).
path(x, y) :- graph(x, y).
path(x, y) :- graph(x, z), path(z, y).
vertex(x)  :- graph(x, _).
vertex(x)  :- graph(_, x).
author: scott
